Name: Egg Hunter Hatchling
Traits: Amphibious. The egg hunter can breathe air and water.
Actions: Multiattack. The egg hunter makes two Egg Tooth attacks. Egg Tooth. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 17 (4d6 + 3) piercing damage if the target is an object.
Bonus Actions: Rapid Movement. The egg hunter takes the Dash or Disengage action.
